_sText:
<fieldset>Sackhammer - Created By Blaine 'Soiled' Donlon

Bomb Defuse Map Info:

There are 2 bomb sites, a Bank and a Train Station.... Terrorists should destroy them, Counter-Terrorists should protect them.

The CT's have the advantage of accessing each bomb site faster than the T's so they can setup a defence, the T's will have to break through that defence to destroy their target.

TeamWork wins!


Additional Credits are hidden within this map.
enjoy!

|| DE_SACKHAMMER ||

-----------
AUTHOR INFO
-----------
NAME: BLAINE DONLON
SCREENNAME: SOILED
URL: WWW.SOILED.CA
E-MAIL: BWDTHUNDER@COGECO.CA


*****INSTALL IT*****
--------------------
PUT THE DE_SACKHAMMER.BSP, DE_SACKHAMMER.NAV DE_SACKHAMMER.TXT FILES IN YOUR "Valve\Steam\SteamApps\<username>\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps" FOLDER AND YOU SHOULD BE GOOD TO GO, ALL CUSTOM TEXTURES HAVE BEEN EMBEDED INTO THE .BSP FILE AND WILL APPEAR DURING PLAY WITHOUT ANY ADDITIONAL DOWNLOADING.


--------
MAP INFO
--------
GAME: COUNTER-STRIKE:SOURCE
NAME: SACKHAMMER
TYPE: DE (DEFUSE/BOMB)
PLAYERS: UP TO 64 -> NOT RECCOMENDED THO :D

CUSTOM TEXTURES? YES
WHAT ABOUT SOUNDS? NO

-----------
OTHER STUFF
-----------
- I STARTED CREATING THIS MAP ON DEC 22ND 2004, AND I FINISHED IT ALL UP ON MAY 22ND 2005 (EXACTLY 5MONTHS).
- I USED PAINTSHOP PRO 9 FOR ALL THE TEXTURES I CREATED
- ALL OTHER TEXTURES ARE FROM http://www.planetquake.com/berneyboy WHERE YOU CAN GET A MASSIVE TEXTURE PACK WITH ABOUT 2000 TEXTURES.
- WWW.DODART.NET IS THE BEST DAMN ART COMMUNITY, THANX TO ALL THEM GUYS/GALS FOR MAKING ME FINISH THIS MAP.

===============================================
SACKHAMMER BETA TESTING WAS PREFORMED BY:
BLAINE 'SOILED' DONLON & ANDREW 'CHAPEL' SHAVER
===============================================

THANX FOR PLAYING ALONG.
-SOILED


SKIRTDERDER!


***********************
COPYRIGHT 2004-2005:
THE CONTENT IN THIS PACKAGE SHOULD NOT BE USED AS A WHOLE, OR IN PART, WITHOUT 1ST ASKING PERMISSION OF THE OWNER (BLAINE 'SOILED' DONLON).

PLEASE UNDERSTAND THIS TOOK A VERY LONG TIME TO CREATE, AND I MUST BE NOTIFIED IF YOU WISH TO USE THE CONTENTS OF THIS PACKAGE!
***********************
